# Pieter Colpaert

I am a researcher, evangelist and entrepreneur in linked open data.

You can also find me here:
[Twitter](http://twitter.com/pietercolpaert), [Google+](https://plus.google.com/110114073598043885251/posts/p/pub), [Github](https://github.com/pietercolpaert)

## Research

### Publications

 * Colpaert, P., Vander Sande, M., Mannens, E., Van de Walle, R., [Follow The Stars](http://archive.ugent.be/input/download?func=downloadFile&fileOId=1964760&recordOId=1964754),2011
 * Vander Sande, M., Colpaert, P., Van Deursen, D., Mannens, E., Van de Walle, R., [The DataTank: an Open Data adapter with semantic output](http://www2012.org/proceedings/nocompanion/DevTrack_014.pdf)

You can find these on [google scholar](http://scholar.google.be/citations?user=fSlc4YAAAAAJ&hl=nl&oi=ao)

You can find my master's thesis on The DataTank over [here](http://pieter.demo.thedatatank.com/scriptie.pdf)

### Affiliation
 * [UGent](http://ugent.be)
 * [iMinds](http://iminds.be)
 * [Multi Media Lab](http://multimedialab.elis.ugent.be)

## Projects
 * SoLoMIDEM
 * [The DataTank](http://thedatatank.com)
 * Apps For Europe

## Not for profit
 * I am the chair man of [Open Knowledge Foundation Belgium](http://okfn.be) in 2013
 * Active as board man of [iRail](http://hello.iRail.be), a Belgian not for profit supporting digital creativity concerning mobility

## For profit

Together with [Yeri Tiete](http://tuinslak.be) and [RentalVALUE](http://www.RentalVALUE.be), I have started a company in real-time digital signage called [FlatTurtle](https://flatturtle.com). Follow us on our [blog](http://blog.flatturtle.com).
